ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] General Comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea I actually kind of dont like being in the pull group because of agro, but my guild s Modus Operandi seems to be group 1 is: Main tank (who often pulls, we
ygData.messageBody:
Yea I actually kind of dont like being in the pull group because of agro,
but my guild's Modus Operandi seems to be group 1 is:
Main tank (who often pulls, we are a bit short on monks and SKs)
Paladin (for stuns and CH I imagine)
Main Enchanter
Cleric (usually the highest)
Highest Druid (for backup heals, usually he ends up healing me, heh)
Highest Bard (yours truly, our guild is seriously lacking in bards, I joined
about a month ago and usually I am the only one there, on the upside I am
getting some great equipment, heh)

I sing clarity while pulling (small radius, if puller is in the range, no
way the group isnt getting agroed). Is the radius in 55 song bigger? I
dinged 54 this weekend, so I am not too far (one hella long level) away.
When the fight starts I do Song of Shields, Cantata (34 one), Nillipus
(sometimes this is replaced by a second pulse of SoS since we end up with
all the buff slots filled and the cleric cant use Heal over time spells).
THe only problem I see to run into is the agro I created is pretty ugly...

Elfson Allegro <The Circle of Eternity> 54 Veeshan
